Plot: A teenage girl raids a man's home in order to expose him under suspicion that he is a sex offender with pedophilia (not to be confused with a person who suffers the condition of pedophilia).
Title: Hard Candy
Actors: Patrick Wilson, Ellen Page, Sandra Oh, Odessa Rae
tomatoConsensus: Disturbing, controversial, but entirely engrossing, Hard Candy is well written with strong lead performances, especially that of newcomer Ellen Page. A movie that stays with the viewer long after leaving the theater.
